name: Sniper Assassin Battle Royale
description:
You are air drop on a lonely military base located on a secret island with the minimal resources but yet with the Special Forces training and expertise, plan your every move like an expert undercover spy soldier and eliminate all the targets without collateral damage, complete all the objectives and don’t get detected because if you are seen by the enemy they will slaughter you, enemy is not expecting any attack so take your chances and kill them all before they do so. So what are you waiting for grab you chance become one of the special agent on the dangerous battleground and fight for the glory. Now you have to eliminate all the targets before being targeted, without completing the missions there is no going back, because extraction and back is not able to land in the enemy presence.

Features:
Green vegetation military set up environment for the exciting and challenging levels.
Multiple weaponry and military equipment.
Challenging shooting and stealth killing missions.
Highly detailed 3D models.
Engaging and fun game play.
